entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is trying to give Harry a hint about You Know Who. He is worried and his eyes are wide.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is trying to figure out who You Know Who is.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the Headmaster of Hogwarts and has great powers. He is compared to You Know Who.

entities.name: you know who
entities.description: You Know Who is a mysterious person that Dobby and Harry are trying to figure out. It seems to be someone with great power.

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is another name for You Know Who. He has great powers.
